title: Dilshan century guides Sri Lanka to series win
content: (Reuters) – Tillakaratne Dilshan scored his 17th one-day international century and shared a second wicket stand of 184 with Kumar Sangakkara to guide Sri Lanka to a series clinching eight wicket win over South Africa in the fourth match at Pallekele on Sunday. The hosts were outplayed in the third match two days ago at…
